alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 15 at 12:56AM MST until February 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Cave Creek/New River, Rio Verde/Salt River and Fountain Hills/East Mesa. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River
